appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message: This extension hides trending information from twitter timelines to make your mind calm.

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

titleIsTrendsHidden.message: Hide trends and who to follow from right column

titleIsReactionNumberHidden.message: Hide numbers of replies, retweets, and likes
